properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical, Chaos, Orb

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: 40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 31% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 32% increased Area of Effect
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.
explicitMods: Cursed Enemies take 58% increased Damage while on Low Life
Cursed Enemies are Debilitated for 2.00 Seconds when they Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.

Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that you cast yourself. Cannot support triggered skills, Vaal skills, instant skills, channelling skills, skills with a reservation or which create minions, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield

This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed.
